text:
@realDonaldTrump COVID-19 virus, you fetid racist.  Yes, Cuomo, unlike you, is looking out for ALL Americans. 
W. Virginia has "zero" cases because THEY ARE NOT DOING ANY TESTING, being a GOP state.
You just can't step up to anything, can you?  
You are a wretched failure in every possible way.
